title: Vintage Florsheim Imperial 92332 Balmoral Cap-Toe Oxfords 12D
listperfectly_description:
Timeless craftsmanship with brogued cap-toe and classic Balmoral facing.
Crafted January 1977, these vintage Florsheim Imperial Oxfords feature a sleek Balmoral silhouette with baroque cap-toe and facing. Goodyear welted black leather with leather soles and Cat's Paw heels. Built for formal wear and collectors of American-made craftsmanship.
Includes one pair of men's oxford dress shoes.
- Men's Oxfords (pair)
Approximate measurements (estimates) are below.
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): ~12.75 in (32.4 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): ~4.5 in (11.4 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): ~12.25 in (31.1 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): ~4.0 in (10.2 cm)
- Heel height: ~1.0 in (2.5 cm)
- Weight (pair): ~2.8 lb (1.27 kg)
Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed—grab them before they're gone.
